summary: Footer.tsx was updated to add a new “Website Designed By” section and include an Instagram icon import. However, the diff shows no newly added static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, which is required for the designer photo.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the designer photo as a static generated asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and display it in the new footer card as a circular portrait (cropped to a circle) with appropriate sizing across breakpoints.
missing_requirements.reason: The footer references an image at /assets/generated/designer-photo.dim_320x320.png, but the diff indicates no added files, so the required new static asset does not appear to have been created/committed under frontend/public/assets/generated.
